data.message: Hello Eminem sir. Wanted to give you a listen to my voice I am an aspiring singer/rapper. And i wanted to know if you like the way I sounded. I have a little snippet of a cover by majid jordan. please tell me what you think thanks Em talk to you soon. you really are a real character very funny gentleman i would love to learn from one of the greats such as yourself one day. https://soundcloud.com/user-979342357/record-1487
